author: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JCA (delivering the judgment of the court ex tempore):
casenumber: Court of Appeal — Civil Appeal No 206 of 2020
casename: Ranjit Singh s/o Ramdarsh Singh (suing as co-executor of the estate of Ramdarsh Singh s/o Danukdhari Singh (alias Ram Darash Singh), deceased and as a beneficiary of the estate) v Harisankar Singh (sued as co-executor of the estate of Ramdarsh Singh s/o Danukdhari Singh (alias Ram Darash Singh), deceased and in his personal capacity)
coram: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JCA, Tay Yong Kwang JCA and Steven Chong JCA
counsel: Ranvir Kumar Singh (UniLegal LLC) for the appellant; Twang Kern Zern and Lam Jianhao Mark (Central Chambers Law Corporation) for the respondent.
